scripts.release: yarn build && yarn workspaces foreach -A --no-private exec node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8');if(p.includes('workspace:')){console.error('workspace: protocol found in package.json for '+process.cwd());process.exit(1)}" && yarn workspaces foreach -A --no-private exec yarn npm publish --access public --tolerate-republish
